name: Handmade, Hand Dyed Infinity Scarf
description:
This cotton scarf is a 100% cotton (muslin) and hand dyed. In the dye process, I immerse the fabric into a tea bath and then add in pigments to get the rich, rustic colors. 

This scarf is perfect and lightweight for the late spring and summer months. Vivid & Vivacious, a perfect accessory for both men and women. The infinity style is very on-trend and great for Summer. It also works as a great nursing cover!

Available Colors: 
- Yellow: bright and cheery 
- Seafoam Green: soft and soothing
- La Gris Gray/Blue: a neutral color with a French sea vibe
- Purple: works on all skin tones
- Wine/Raspberry: trendy and soothing
- Red: warm and bold
- Pink: a light tone, great on dark skin colors

Measurements: 22 inches wide x 6 feet long

All edges are finished and hemmed - no fraying!

name: Ombre Merci Matchbooks - Set of 4
description:
These matchbooks are handmade from manilla cardstock and hand-painted with watercolors in an ombre-ish technique. A strike-on light strip on the back makes for easy lighting! Hand-stamped with a "merci" stamp, it makes for a perfect party favor! 

Please note that since each matchbook is hand-painted and hand-stamped, each is completely unique to itself and the color will vary matchbook to matchbook.

Choose all 4 in a single color or a variety pack which includes one match in each color

Colors:
- pink
- purple
- blue
- green

name: 16 oz Scented Soy Wax Candle in a Tin
description:
Eco-friendly scented soy wax candle available in our amazing variety of scents: 
- Grapefruit: citrusy and perfect for summer 
- Pomegranate: sweet and fruity
- Lavender: aromatherapy, strong and soothing 
- Cedarwood: musky and fresh 
- Vanilla: sweet and reliable

Burn Time: 50+ hours // 2 wicks

Materials: soy wax, cotton wick, all natural fragrance and essential oils

Decorated with book paper from books about American presidents, as a tribute to the city they are made in - Washington, DC

handmade in Washington, DC.
